title: Creamy Vegetable and Potato Soup
ingredients: ['600ml water', '2 potatoes, peeled and cubed', '1 tablespoon salt or to taste', '1 carrot, chopped', '1 stick celery, chopped', '1/4 onion, chopped', '1 cube beef stock', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '80g frozen mixed vegetables', '1 (295g) tin cream of celery condensed soup', '1/4 tablespoon dried parsley', '1/2 teaspoon onion powder', 'ground black pepper to taste']
